jointly estimate.from sentence: The basic idea of our method is to jointly estimate the upper-bound frequency of each target vocabulary that can occur in a summary during the encoding process and exploit the estimation to control the output words in each decoding step .

additional component.from sentence: We refer to our additional component as a wordfrequency estimation ( WFE ) sub-model .

explicitly manages: how many times each word has been generated so far
might be generated in the future
WFE sub-model.from sentence: The WFE sub-model explicitly manages how many times each word has been generated so far and might be generated in the future during the decoding process .
